name: Open Source MANO Resource Specification
description: This Resource Specification is used to describe an OSM

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: Name
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: The alias of the OSM as it will be seen in the platform

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: Description
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: The description of the OSM as it will be seen in the platform

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: ApiUrlEndpoint
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: The API URL Endpoint of the OSM

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: Project
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: The project for which the MANO Provider is intended to be used
